document.discussion_title: SPEAK UP: 4 steps for establishing credibility and influence
document.topic_text: SPEAK UP: 4 steps for establishing credibility and influence Monday, April 25, 2016 8:00 AM For many female leaders, their biggest challenge is building greater credibility and influence. Whether starting at a new company, in a new position or simply taking on more responsibility, most of us want to begin on the right foot. In a recent conversation, Jo Miller of Be Leaderly discovered how how we might build credibility and the positive influence to make a difference in our organizations. Read more
